original_title: I Am Not Your Perfect Mexican Daughter
overview: The New York Times bestseller from Erika L. SÃ¡nchez follows Julia Reyes, the precocious and strong-willed teenaged daughter of first-generation Mexican immigrants. She often clashes with her more traditional parents, who wish she were more like her sister Olga, the platonic ideal of a Mexican daughter. However, when Olga is killed in a tragic accident, it is up to Julia to hold her family together.
title: I Am Not Your Perfect Mexican Daughter
